scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/types && npm run build -w packages/utils && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:fe && npm run deploy:be
scripts.deploy:fe: npm run build -w apps/web && sudo cp -r apps/web/dist/* /var/www/frontend/
scripts.deploy:be: npm run build -w apps/api && pm2 restart all
